mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Berthault, Pierre Gabriel, 1737-1831
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Simonneau, Jacques-Guillaume, -1792
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Pompe funèbre en l'honneur de Simoneau marie d'Éstampes
Funeral procession in honor of Simoneau, mayor of Éstampes
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Men and women in a parade line carry an empty chair, several images on poles, and an allegory of the law through a street as troops stand at attention along the street and citizens watch
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Broadus Bailey French Revolution Print Collection
